name: spreadsheetAddFreezePane
description: Adds freeze pane (non-scrollable columns/rows) to spreadsheet

params.name: freezeColumn
params.description: Amout of columns from left which should be freezed

params.name: freezeRow
params.description: Amout of rows from top which should be freezed

params.name: hideColumn
params.description: Amount of columns which should be hidden under/behind freezed columns (Scrolls left to first unhidden column).

params.name: hideRow
params.description: Amount of rows which should be hidden under/behind freezed rows (Scrolls down to first unhidden row).
